channel.title: Lincoln on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Lincoln on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Restaurant Pearl Morissette
item.description: Restaurant Pearl Morissette is located near the Niagara region of Canada in an area called “Jordan Station” neighborhood of Lincoln, Ontario. My partner and I visited Niagara Falls recently, and wanted to make a trip out to this restaurant from the U.S. side of Niagara. The drive into this area was very easy. Because we foolishly decided to eat at this restaurant rather late, we initially did not find any availability.
